Actions.Name: Slice and Dice
Actions.Effect: May dash 1 before or after attack.

Actions.Name: Double Tap
Actions.Description: The Aeronaut flies 3 spaces in a straight line. At the start and end of their movement, they may deal fray damage to two different characters in range 3.

Actions.Name: Blinding Grenade
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 is blinded. Blinded foes take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Takeoff
Actions.Description: The Aeronaut launches into the air. While in this stance, they are flying and have evasion. They lose this stance if they are hit by an attack.
